SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client

Interface ClientViewUpdater

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiUpdater, TuiUpdater
public interface ClientViewUpdater
Interface that defines the methods that are called from the network side to notify the user interface of a change in the model, there is a method for each type of update so that the view can handle them in a different way.

    • updateDeckTop

      void updateDeckTop (@NotNull @NotNull PlayableCardType type, @Nullable @Nullable GameColor color)
      Update the deck top card
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the deck
      color - the color of the card

    • updateField

      void updateField (@NotNull @NotNull String nickname, int x, int y, int cardId, boolean isRetro) throws SyncIssueException
      Update the field of the player, it can place or remove a card, if the removeMode is true, the cardId and isRetro are ignored.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      x - the x coordinate of the card
      y - the y coordinate of the card
      cardId - the id of the card
      isRetro - if the card is placed on it's retro
      Throws:
      SyncIssueException

    • updateShownPlayable

      void updateShownPlayable (Integer previousId, Integer currentId)
      Update the visible cards on the table, it will remove the previousId and add the currentId
      Parameters:
      previousId - the id of the card to remove
      currentId - the id of the card to add

      void notifyGodPlayer()
      Notify the player that he is the god player, the god player is the moderator of the game. It will set the god player and confirm the player name in the model
